title: Hall Pass
description: If not the keys to the kingdom at least a sovereign's privacy in the palace, a hall pass will allow you to create a password-protected drama. Once the drama begins, your hall pass will disappear.

title: Acrylic Nails
description: Acrylics: wicked on the nails and when quickly applied to the face. This weapon can be used during a drama when making a scratch; if your attack succeeds your nails will deal +1 self esteem damage to the victim, but afterwards the nails are destroyed.

title: Hairstick
description: An assassin's weapon excused by fashion, this dangerous spike will gouge the face of a schoolgirl to extreme effect. Hairsticks can be used during a drama when making a scratch; if your attack succeeds the sharp stick will deal +2 self esteem damage to the victim, but afterwards the hairstick is destroyed.
